trans-unit.source: Combines multiple dependencies between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> object and an array of <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 結合儲存於 ASP.NET 應用程式之 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> 物件中的項目和 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency" /> 物件的陣列之間的多個相依性。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency> class monitors a collection of dependency objects so that when any of them change, the cached item is automatically removed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency>類別監視相依性物件的集合，而當其中任何變更時，會自動移除快取的項目。

trans-unit.source: The objects in the array can be <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency> objects, <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency> objects, custom objects derived from <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency>, or any combination of these.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中的物件可以是<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency>物件<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency>物件、 自訂物件衍生自<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency>，或上述任何組合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency> class differs from the <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency> class in that it allows you to associate multiple dependencies of different types with a single cached item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency>類別不同於<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency>類別，因為它可讓您將不同類型的多個相依性與單一快取項目產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you create a page that imports data from a SQL Server database table and an XML file, you can create a <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency> object to represent a dependency on the database table and a <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency> to represent the dependency on the XML file.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您建立可從 SQL Server 資料庫資料表和 XML 檔匯入資料的頁面，您可以建立<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency>物件以代表資料庫資料表上的相依性和<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency>來代表的相依性的 XML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Rather than making an <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Insert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method call for each dependency, you can create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency> class with each dependency added to it.
trans-unit.target: 而不是進行<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Insert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法呼叫的每個相依性，您可以建立的執行個體<xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency>類別新增至其中的每個相依性。

trans-unit.source: You can then use a single <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Insert%2A> call to make the page dependent on the <xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency> instance.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以使用單一<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Insert%2A>讓頁面相依於呼叫<xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency> class to add a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, named `XMLDataSet`, to the cache that is dependent on a text file and an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency>類別加入<xref:System.Data.DataSet>具名`XMLDataSet`，取決於文字檔案和 XML 檔案的快取。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor for the <xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency> class.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設建構函式<xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency> class, using the constructor that takes no arguments.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例建立的執行個體<xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency>類別，使用不接受引數的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency> objects are created, then added to a <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency> array, `myDepArray`.
trans-unit.target: 兩個<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency>物件所建立，則會加入至<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency>陣列、 `myDepArray`。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency.Add%2A> method to make the item stored in the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> dependent on both <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency> objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式用於搭配<xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency.Add%2A>方法中所儲存的項目<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>相依於兩者<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency>物件。

trans-unit.source: The array of <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency" /> objects to add.
trans-unit.target: 要新增的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: Adds an array of <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency" /> objects to the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency" /> 物件陣列新增至 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency.Add%2A> method in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create two <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency> objects, add them to a <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency> array named `myDepArray`, and then make the item in the cache dependent on those two <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency.Add%2A>方法搭配<xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency.%23ctor%2A>建構函式來建立兩個<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency>物件，將它們加入<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency>名為陣列`myDepArray`，然後進行項目在快取這兩者而定<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency>物件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dependencies" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dependencies" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
A <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency" /> object in <paramref name="dependencies" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dependencies" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency" /> 物件為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency" /> object is referenced from more than one <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> entry.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency" /> 物件由超過一個以上的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> 項目參考。

trans-unit.source: Gets the file dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 取得檔案相依性。

trans-unit.source: The file dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 檔案相依性。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a unique identifier for the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency" /> 物件的唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency" /> 物件的唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: If one of the associated dependency objects does not have a unique identifier, the <see cref="M:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency.GetUniqueID" /> method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果其中一個相關聯的相依性物件沒有唯一識別碼，則 <see cref="M:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency.GetUniqueID" /> 方法會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method assigns a unique identifier to each dependency in the array and returns each of them.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將唯一的識別碼指派給陣列中每個相依性，並傳回每個。

trans-unit.source: The identifier is a combination of either the file name (for a file dependency) or the key name (for a cache-key dependency) and a string that this method assigns to the dependency.
trans-unit.target: 識別碼是 （適用於檔案相依性） 的檔案名稱或索引鍵的名稱 （適用於快取索引鍵的相依性） 和字串，這個方法會將指派給相依性的組合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency.GetUniqueID%2A> method to create and display an identifier for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency> class, named `aggDep`, once it is created and populated.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency.GetUniqueID%2A>方法來建立和顯示執行個體識別項<xref:System.Web.Caching.AggregateCacheDependency>類別，名為`aggDep`，一旦建立並填入。
